course_title: Topics in Human Health: Critical Evaluation of Epi
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 23Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: (PREREQUISITE: HLTH 207) In Critical Evaluation of Epi, we learn how to read and critically evaluate peer-reviewed epidemiological studies. We will discuss various strengths and limitations of epidemiological research as well the how to interpret results and how results are disseminated.
sections: Class Nbr: 3519, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: R. Hood, Status: Open
